content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in a case involving the distribution of goods and funds the total value of the goods is 5500 eur and includes personal bank accounts and unpaid pension benefits the estate is divided among the niece widow and nephew of the deceased the widow waived her share and accepted a different share resulting in her inheriting half of the estate the court based its decision on specific articles of the inheritance act the municipality of ljubljana is involved in the proceedings and a petition was filed to annul an inheritance amount for funeral expenses the court determined the legitimate heirs and examined the deceaseds property some heirs waived their share while others did not attend the hearing or submit a declaration the court declared the heirs who did not renounce their inheritance as the legal heirs the court also ruled on a proposal to limit the inheritance amount to cover funeral expenses the court fees must be paid by a certain date the court has postponed issuing a final order until receiving a response from a specific party the text explains the process of lodging an appeal including the time limit and requirements for submitting the appeal

metadata.cost: 216,00 EUR fees and 5'500 EUR inheritance assets
metadata.subject_of_succession: funds on personal bank account, unpaid pension benefits
